title: Farmers Insurance Font
content:
Is the Farmers Insurance logo in an accessible font, or is it one they've created specifically for their logo. If that's the case, what accessible font is the closest?

Thanks!

Steve
author: TrueSummitPromotions

comments.content:
Which part of the logo are you interested in?

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111122235im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Farmerslogo_5403.jpg)

If it's the red FARMERS, I think it is a customization of [Triplett](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111122235/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/Detail.htm?pid=203167&/cgi-bin/MsmGo.exe?grab_id=0&page_id=54784&query=TRIPLETT&SCOPE=Fonts) by Compugraphic, or possibly Friz Quadrata, which is similar.

- Mike Yanega
